description:
Banish hat head forever. These new ear covers keep your ears snugly warm for activities like skiing, cycling, or climbing. Small and easily portable, you can also wear them under a hat or helmet.

  • Made of Polartec® microfibre fleece
  • Small fits ears 5.7cm or shorter, medium fits 5.7 to 7cm, large fits 7cm and longer
name: Sprigs Earbags Bandless Earwarmers - Unisex
